original_text: And when the king of Moab saw that the battle was too sore for him, he took with him seven hundred men that drew swords, to break through even unto the king of Edom: but they could not.
korean_text: 모압 왕이 전세가 극렬하여 당하기 어려움을 보고 칼찬 군사 칠백 명을 거느리고 돌파하여 지나서 에돔 왕에게로 가고자 하되 가지 못하고

sentences.original_text: And when the king of Moab saw
that the battle was too sore for him
he took with him seven hundred men
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그와 함께 칠백 명의 사람들을 데려갔고

sentences.original_text: to break through even unto the king of Edom
